name: ts-maps-nuxt
description: Nuxt components for ts-maps - Interactive Vector Maps
author: Chris Breuer <chris@stacksjs.org>

scripts.build:types: bunx tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && bunx api-extractor run
scripts.dev: npm run dev:prepare && nuxi dev playground
scripts.dev:prepare: bunx nuxt-module-build build --stub && bunx nuxt-module-build prepare && nuxi prepare playground
